data.message: Marshall Mathers, I know you'll never read this but you're the most talented white man i have ever seen. You may have been through a lot of pain and depression but never forget real fans love every word you give us,, We feed our life with your talented words.. You recovered﻿ now its time that you blow up again and make the world realise what a talented person you are. I respect you, And i know that's all you need.
